items.title: Around 40 dead in Swiss ski resort bar fire, police say
items.description: A further 115 are injured, some severely, in a fire at Le Constellation bar in Crans-Montana ski resort, officials say.

items.title: Social media fuelled Mamdani's rise. Can he keep the momentum as New York mayor?
items.description: To succeed in office he will need to keep his supporters engaged with day-to-day governing, experts say.

items.title: Two killed in clashes between protesters and security forces in Iran
items.description: Videos on social media showed cars set on fire during running battles as protests entered their fifth day.

items.title: What we know about the Switzerland ski resort fire
items.description: Several dozen people are presumed to have died in the fire at a New Year party in the resort of Crans-Montana.

items.title: New discovery may challenge theory Vikings built first Irish towns - researcher
items.description: Dr Dirk Brandherm and his colleagues have identified more than 600 suspected house platforms in the Brusselstown Ring.
